Workflow.Name: Delivery Framework - update relevant record values
Workflow.Description: This flow is optional. A Delivery Framework record is automatically generated and populated for each Project and Project Activity record that is created. This flow updates active Delivery Framework records with current values from its associated Project or Project Activity record.

LocalizedName.description: Delivery Framework - update relevant record values

Description.description: This flow is optional. A Delivery Framework record is automatically generated and populated for each Project and Project Activity record that is created. This flow updates active Delivery Framework records with current values from its associated Project or Project Activity record.
